analyzed: sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i mi khom pa brgyad de /

original: dam pa'i chos kyi go skabs med la /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyi go skabs med la /
translated: There is no opportunity for the holy Dharma.

original: dud 'gro ni mi shes pa ste /

original: de ni tha ma'i'o //
analyzed: de ni tha ma'i'o //

original: de'i yul @185b ni 'dug pa ste /
analyzed: de'i yul @185b ni 'dug pa ste /

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten no //
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten no //

original: de yang gnyis su shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang gnyis su shes par bya'o //

analyzed: yang na ngan song gsum po de dag gi rgyu ni phal cher srog gcod pa dang ser sna dang gti mug las shes par bya'o //

original: gsum po de dag ni ngan par song ba yin no //
analyzed: gsum po de dag ni ngan par song ba yin no //

analyzed: las ngan pa shin tu chung ba ni yul mtha' 'khob la sogs pa ste /

original: ngan pa 'di dag ni ngan 'gro yin no //
analyzed: ngan pa 'di dag ni ngan 'gro yin no //

original: mtha' 'khob ni yul gang na chos la sogs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: mtha' 'khob ni yul gang na chos la sogs pa med pa ste /

original: yul gyi mtha'o //
analyzed: yul gyi mtha'o //

analyzed: kla klo ni glen zhing rmugs pa'i rang bzhin te skad bzang po med pa la sogs pa mi shes pa'o //

analyzed: de shi nas dmyal bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: shin tu yid kyi dbang po la skyon zhugs pa ni ngan pa'o //

analyzed: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang bral ba ste sangs rgyas la sogs pa med do zhes sems pa lta ba phyin ci log ni chad par lta ba ste /

original: gzhan pa rtag par lta ba la sogs pa yang ngo //
analyzed: gzhan pa rtag par lta ba la sogs pa yang ngo //
translated: And also the other views, such as the eternalist view.

analyzed: de ltar na brgyad do //

original: sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni spyir yin te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni spyir yin te /

analyzed: de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni sh'akya thub pa la sogs pa de rnams so //
translated: The Bhagavat Buddhas are Sakyamuni, etc.

analyzed: de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pas na ye shes so // dge sdig gi @186a * //
translated: They are omniscient, thus they are knowledge.

original: las la sogs pa gsal bar rtogs pas na spyan no //
analyzed: las la sogs pa gsal bar rtogs pas na spyan no //

original: dbang po ni legs pa dang nyes pa'i khyad par thugs su chud pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po ni legs pa dang nyes pa'i khyad par thugs su chud pa'o //
translated: The faculties are the understanding of the distinctions between good and bad.

analyzed: tshig la sogs pa 'khrul ba med pas na tshad ma ste mi slu ba'o //
translated: Because of the absence of error in speech, etc., he is the authority, i.e., the non-deceptive one.

analyzed: thugs kyis thams cad mkhyen pas na mkhyen pa'o //

translated: He is the seer because of the all-seeing eye of wisdom.

original: spyan sngar ni da ltar mdun du'o //
analyzed: spyan sngar ni da ltar mdun du'o //
translated: In his presence means in the present, in front.

original: tshul ji ltar bshags pa ni mthol ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: tshul ji ltar bshags pa ni mthol ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The manner of confession, etc., is as follows.

original: yang dag par yin gyi ngag 'khyal la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yang dag par yin gyi ngag 'khyal la sogs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is the truth, not idle talk, etc.

analyzed: de la ngag gis brjod pa ni mthol ba'o //
translated: Therein, verbal expression is confession.

original: 'chags pa ni yid kyis so sor ro //
analyzed: 'chags pa ni yid kyis so sor ro //
translated: Confession is individual acceptance by the mind.

original: nyes pa de khas len pas zhi la mi 'chab pa'o //
analyzed: nyes pa de khas len pas zhi la mi 'chab pa'o //

original: mi sbed pa ni dngos su ste /

original: de ltar stobs gnyis bstan nas /

translated: Thus, having taught the two powers,

analyzed: de ni nyes pa las kun tu ldog pa'i stobs kyis sdig pa bshags pa ni slan chad kyang gcod cing sdom par bgyid lags so zhes gsungs so //

original: de yang sngar gyi 'gyod cing /
analyzed: de yang sngar gyi 'gyod cing /
translated: Moreover, one regrets the past,

original: da ltar gyi 'chags la /

analyzed: de ltar stobs gsum pa bstan nas da ni gnyen po kun du spyod pa'i stobs ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Having thus explained the third power, now the power of the antidote's practice is explained by the buddhas, etc.

analyzed: de la sdig pa de dag slar mi 'phel zhing tshogs bsags pa'i don du rgyud la dge ba bstan pa ni sman lta bur shes par bya'o //
translated: In order to prevent the increase of those sins and to accumulate merit, the wholesome should be taught in the mind, like medicine.

analyzed: de la bsngo ba la sogs pa thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' la pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan la /
translated: In this regard, all dedications, etc. are associated with the six perfections of the bodhisattva.

translated: It should be understood that he takes up a good rebirth.

original: de la khams gsum gyi skye gnas te lha dang mi dag tu'o //
analyzed: de la khams gsum gyi skye gnas te lha dang mi dag tu'o //
translated: In this regard, the rebirth in the three realms is in the gods and humans.

analyzed: sbyin ba dang mthun pa ni sbyin pa'i tha ma ste /
translated: The one who is in agreement with generosity is the lowest in generosity.

original: des mchog kyang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: des mchog kyang shes par bya'o //
translated: By that, the highest should be understood.

original: dud 'gro'i skye gnas ni khyi la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dud 'gro'i skye gnas ni khyi la sogs pa'o //
translated: The rebirth in the animal realm is the dog, etc.

original: de ni yul chung ba ste chen po yang gzung @186b ngo ;
analyzed: de ni yul chung ba ste chen po yang gzung @186b ngo ;
translated: That is the small realm. The great realm is also included.

original: / kham gcig ni dngos po chung ba ste chen po yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: / kham gcig ni dngos po chung ba ste chen po yang shes par bya'o //
translated: One morsel is a small thing, but it should be understood that it is also a great thing.

original: tshul khrims ni tshul khrims dang mthun pa ste /
analyzed: tshul khrims ni tshul khrims dang mthun pa ste /
translated: Morality is in accord with morality.

original: sdom pa'i tshul khrims la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sdom pa'i tshul khrims la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is the morality of restraint, etc.

original: rnam par dka' ba bskyed pas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par dka' ba bskyed pas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'o //
translated: The roots of virtue are generated by the difficult process.
